home.title: Project Moon Hub

hero.title: Face the Fear, Build the Future
hero.subtitle: Your definitive guide to the grim, captivating universe of Project Moon. Welcome to The City.

intro.title: An Invitation to The City
intro.p1: The world of Project Moon is dominated by a single, sprawling megalopolis known only as The City. It is a place of stark contrasts, where unimaginable technology born from "Singularities" coexists with soul-crushing dystopia. The City is ruled by 26 hyper-corporate entities known as "The Wings," each with its own laws, ethics, and monstrous power.
intro.p2: From the creature-containment halls of Lobotomy Corporation, to the fateful duels in the Library of Ruina, and the desperate pilgrimage of the Sinners in Limbus Company, every story is a struggle for survival, identity, and a sliver of humanity in a world that has forgotten its meaning. We are here to document it all.

lobotomy.title: Lobotomy Corp
lobotomy.desc: Manage horrifying Abnormalities and harvest their energy. A monster management simulation where failure has dire consequences.

ruina.title: Library of Ruina
ruina.desc: Become the owner of a mystical Library and turn your guests into books. A "Library Battle Simulation" with deep deck-building mechanics.

limbus.title: Limbus Company
limbus.desc: Lead a team of 12 Sinners on a quest through The City to reclaim the Golden Boughs. A turn-based RPG with a cinematic flair.

limbus.subtitle: Lead the Sinners on a journey through The City in search of Golden Boughs

sephirahs.title: Sephirah Guides
sephirahs.subtitle: Learn about each department head and how to complete their meltdowns
sephirahs.treeDesc: Each department is managed by a Sephirah - an AI modeled after the structure of the Kabbalah Tree of Life. Completing their stories is key to understanding the truth behind Lobotomy Corporation.
sephirahs.spoilerDesc: Each Sephirah has a complex backstory tied to the facility's dark history. Completing their Core Suppressions reveals the truth behind Lobotomy Corporation.

hero.title: Lobotomy Corporation
hero.subtitle: Manage the unmanageable in the world's most dangerous workplace

intro.title: The First Chapter
intro.p1: Lobotomy Corporation is the first installment in the Project Moon universe, introducing players to the dark and twisted world of The City. As the manager of a wing of the Lobotomy Corporation, your job is to contain and extract energy from mysterious entities known as Abnormalities.
intro.p2: This monster management simulation challenges you to balance resource extraction with employee safety - a nearly impossible task when your workforce faces eldritch horrors daily. Every decision has consequences, and failure often means losing employees to gruesome fates.

premium.title: Premium Content
premium.desc: Detailed strategy guides available for Prime members
premium.blurredDesc: Complete walkthroughs for handling the most dangerous abnormalities...

about.title: About Library of Ruina
about.p1: Library of Ruina is the sequel to Lobotomy Corporation, continuing the story of Angela and the mysterious Library that emerged after the events of the first game. As the new director of the Library, you'll face guests from across The City in dramatic card-based battles.
about.p2: The game features deep deck-building mechanics, memorable characters from all corners of The City, and a story that gradually unravels the complex lore of the Project Moon universe.
